item.title: 257. Binary Tree Paths
item.description: 题目：257. Binary Tree Paths Given a binary tree, return all root-to-leaf paths. For example, given the following binary tree: 1 / 2 3 5 All root-to-leaf paths are: [“1->2->5”, “1->3”] 题意： 难度不大，考察树的遍历 解法： C++版本实现方法： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
